title: User Segmentation
insights:
Dataset Summary

The dataset contains a total of 44,031 events recorded from 499 users over a date range from December 24, 2025 to January 20, 2026. There are 80 unique event types categorized under the application.

Segment Analysis

Outliers

PERSONA NAME: Outliers

PROFILE: This segment consists of 34 users, representing 6.8% of the total user base. They have an average of 361.8 events and a booking rate of 35.3%.

TARGETING RECOMMENDATION: Consider analyzing their behavior further to identify what drives their engagement and booking, and create tailored experiences or offers that could enhance their usage.

Segment 0

PERSONA NAME: Casual Users

PROFILE: This segment includes 465 users, making up 93.2% of the total user base. They engage with an average of 68.2 events but have a low booking rate of 4.7%.

TARGETING RECOMMENDATION: Implement targeted push notifications with incentives such as discounts or promotions to encourage bookings among this segment.

Overall Assessment

The user base appears to have a significant portion of low-engagement users (Casual Users) compared to a smaller group of more engaged users (Outliers). The ratio of high-value users (Outliers) to low-engagement users (Casual Users) is approximately 1:13.7, indicating a need for strategies to convert more casual users into active bookers.
